me.realized.duels.api.kit

Interface Kit


  • public interface Kit
    Represents an Kit loaded on the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equip(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Equips the Player with the contents of this kit.
      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplayed()
      The item displayed in the kit selector gui.
      java.lang.String getName()
      The name of this kit.
      boolean isArenaSpecific()
      Whether or not this kit has arenaSpecific enabled.
      boolean isRemoved()
      Whether or not this Kit has been removed.
      boolean isUsePermission()
      Whether or not this kit requires a permission.
      void setArenaSpecific(boolean arenaSpecific)
      Enables or disables arenaSpecific for this kit.
      void setUsePermission(boolean usePermission)
      Enables or disables usePermission for this kit.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        @NotNull
java.lang.String getName()
        The name of this kit. Will not contain a dash character ("-").
        Returns:
        Never-null String that is the name of this kit.

      • getDisplayed

        @NotNull
org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getDisplayed()
        The item displayed in the kit selector gui.
        Returns:
        item displayed in the kit selector gui.

      • isUsePermission

        boolean isUsePermission()
        Whether or not this kit requires a permission. If usePermission is enabled, players must have the permission 'duels.kit.[name] (space in name replaced to dash)' to use the kit.
        Returns:
        True if usePermission is enabled for this kit. False otherwise.

      • setUsePermission

        void setUsePermission(boolean usePermission)
        Enables or disables usePermission for this kit.
        Parameters:
        usePermission - True to enable usePermission. False otherwise.

      • isArenaSpecific

        boolean isArenaSpecific()
        Whether or not this kit has arenaSpecific enabled. If arenaSpecific is enabled, only arenas with their name starting with this kit's name appended with an underscore will be available when playing with this kit.
        Returns:
        True if arenaSpecific is enabled. False otherwise.

      • setArenaSpecific

        void setArenaSpecific(boolean arenaSpecific)
        Enables or disables arenaSpecific for this kit.
        Parameters:
        arenaSpecific - True to enable arenaSpecific. False otherwise.

      • equip

        boolean equip(@NotNull
              org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Equips the Player with the contents of this kit. Note: Calls KitEquipEvent.
        Parameters:
        player - Player to equip this kit.
        Returns:
        True if Player has successfully equipped this kit. False otherwise.

      • isRemoved

        boolean isRemoved()
        Whether or not this Kit has been removed.
        Returns:
        True if this Kit has been removed. False otherwise.
        Since:
        3.2.0
        See Also:
        KitManager.remove(CommandSender, String)
